original_title: Percy The Park Keeper - Classic Collection
overview: In 'Sledge Ride', Percy and his chums build sledges and have fun in the snow. 'The Rabbit Who Was Afraid of the Dark' sees Percy advising a rabbit who is afraid of the dark to eat more carrots. In 'One Warm Fox', a fox and his chum the Scarecrow borrow some of Percy's clothes to keep warm in the cold winter night. 'The Hedgehog's Balloon' features Percy coming up with a solution to burst balloons for the prickly hedgehog. Whilst in 'Fox's Hiccups', the fox gets hiccups after being told a joke by the squirrel whilst drinking some lemonade. In 'The Hedgehog's Wings', Hedgehog builds himself some wings so that he can fly like a bird. 'The Owl's Lesson' sees Owl attempting to help a little bird that doesn't know how to fly, and in 'Badger's Bath', Percy tells Badger that he must have a bath before he can come to tea. 'A Very Useful Little Friend' sees Mouse getting in the way when Percy, Fox and Badger decide to tidy the shed. The final story is 'Owl Takes Charge'.
title: Percy The Park Keeper - Classic Collection
